    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114590</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114590</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Three-dimensional stacking in hexagonal and cubic close-packed structure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreidimensionales Stapeln in der sechseckigen und
schließen-gepackten Kubikstruktur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Empilement tridimensionnel en structure 
fermer-emballée hexagonale et cubique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Empilhamento tridimensional na estrutura 
fech-embalada sextavada e cúbica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Impilamento tridimensionale in struttura 
chiud-imballata esagonale e cubica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τρισδιάστατη συσσώρευση στην εξαγωνική και κυβική 
στενός-συσκευασμένη δομή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El empilar tridimensional en estructura 
cerrar-pila de discos hexagonal y cúbica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows in 3-dimensions the stacking in (a) hexagonal close-packed crystal structure and (b) cubic close-packed crystal structure.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crystal structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cubic close-packed structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hexagonal close-packed structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spheres</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">three-dimensional stacking</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt in 3-dimensions das Stapeln
(a) in der sechseckigen schließen-gepackten Kristallstruktur und (b) 
in der schließen-gepackten Kubikkristallstruktur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre dans 3-dimensions 
l'empilement en (a) structure en cristal fermer-emballée hexagonale 
et (b) structure en cristal fermer-emballée cubique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra em 3-dimensions o 
empilhamento (a) na estrutura de cristal fech-embalada sextavada e (b)
na estrutura de cristal fech-embalada cúbica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra in 3-dimensions 
l'impilamento in (a) struttura di cristallo chiud-imballata esagonale 
e (b) struttura di cristallo chiud-imballata cubica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει στις 3-διαστάσεις τη 
συσσώρευση (α) στην εξαγωνική στενός-συσκευασμένη δομή 
κρυστάλλου και (β) την κυβική στενός-συσκευασμένη δομή 
κρυστάλλου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra en 3-dimensions empilar
en (a) estructura cristalina cerrar-pila de discos hexagonal y (b) 
estructura cristalina cerrar-pila de discos cúbica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kristallstruktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schließen-gepackte Kubikstruktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sechseckige schließen-gepackte Struktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
